name: NewHtmlReport
tagline: PowerShell module to easily create functional, somewhat styled HTML reports from data, providing additional functionality to what the base ConvertTo-Html cmdlet provides
body:
### Examples for NewHtmlReport PowerShell module

There are some example outputs at:

- [myCombinedReport.htm](myCombinedReport.htm)
- [myVMHostReport.htm](myVMHostReport.htm) 

Note: the CSS and links to resources in these examples are made relative for the purposes of hosting these pages [wherever]. Actual generated reports will use the webserver that you have configured instead of relative paths
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
